er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.title: &6The Mechanic Era
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests0.description0: Main material used in Create. If you don't understand anything about a certain block, hold W while hovering over to ponder about it!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests1.description0: This machine allows you to grind ores with your bare hands, which is quite *handy*.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests2.title: Transfer of kinetic energy
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests4.title: Mixer
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests4.description0: Allows you to mix components using kinetic energy.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests5.title: Press
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests5.description1: You can put items on the depot to make crafting more convenient.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests10.description: It creates an air current... Could come in handy.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests11.title: Sails
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests12.description: The main component of the windmill.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests15.title: Sandstone
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests15.description: You should pay a visit to Atum!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests18.description: An irreplaceable tool for every engineer.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests19.title: Mechanical crafters
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests20.description: A new way of getting kinetic energy.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests22.title: Miscellaneous
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests24.title: Automation
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests26.description: One of the easiest ways to get kinetic energy early game!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests31.title: Burner
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests31.description: To obtain a blaze burner you need to click a blaze with RMB while holding an empty burner in your hand. It's used to heat up components in the basin.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests34.description: Binds shafts together to create a conveyor belt.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests40.title: Smeltery!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests40.description: To build a smeltery, you need 3x3 or 5x5 seared bricks walls(and the floor) of any height. Then, replace some of the bricks with a smeltery controller, a fuel tank and the drains. With this smeltery you can double the resources from your ores!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests41.title: The best tools
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests41.description: You can pour molten metals inside these casts to create tools and weapons.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests42.description: A scarab. You'll need it to build an Atum portal.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests43.description: To build an Atum portal you need to build a 5x5 sandstone platform. Then, raise the borders by 1 block, and pour water in the middle. Finish the structure by building 2 blocks tall columns on each corner, and finally throw a scarab in the water!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests45.description: You can mine obsidian with a diamond pickaxe, which allows you to build a Nether portal.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests50.title: Grout and bricks
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests50.description: The base for your future smeltery.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests51.title: The first smeltery
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests51.description: A start for your new, shining smeltery.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests54.title: Cake base
er.110a9e07e1121f26.title: &6The Atum
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests0.title: Cracked limestone
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests1.title: Nebu ingots
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests1.description0: You can craft Nebu ingots from Nebu drops, which are obtained from smelting the Nebu ore.
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests2.description0: You can use the kiln like a normal furnace.
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests3.description0: The spinning wheel is useful for crafting linen thread and strings.
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests4.title: Nebu hammer
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests4.description0: Nebu hammer is capable of breaking GodForged Blocks, which drop various ancient relics!
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests5.title: The Atum armor
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests5.description0: Looks good on you, but Ra's armor is better!
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests6.title: The Ra's armor
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests6.description0: A strong and stylish set of armor.
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests7.title: Bows
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests7.description0: This mod has a lot of bows, so choose to your liking.
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests8.description0: Osiris's Mercy is obtained by breaking Godforged Block with a Nebu hammer. This relic saves your items after death!
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests9.description0: Seth's Sting is obtained by breaking Godforged Block with a Nebu hammer. This weapon applies poison when fully charged!
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests10.description: Anubis's Wrath is obtained by breaking Godforged Block with a Nebu hammer. This sword absorbs the souls of killed enemies, becoming stronger!
er.110a9e07e1121f26.quests12.title: Limestone
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.title: &6The End
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests0.description0: Flavolite furnace functions exactly like the normal one, however it's also used for crafting the end stone smelter.
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests1.title: Thallasium ingots
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests1.description0: You can craft armor and tools with these, but first check out the end stone smelter!.
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests2.title: Thallasium ore
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests2.description0: Smelt it to get thallasium ingots, which will turn out very useful for the future quests.
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests3.description0: End stone smelter allows to create new, more powerful alloys.
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests4.title: Terminite ingots
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests4.description0: You can craft better gear using these.
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests6.description0: Just an anvil, but of a different color.
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests7.title: Terminite armor
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests8.title: Aeternium ingots
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests8.description0: The most powerful and the most expensive ingots in this mod.
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests10.title: Aeternium armor
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests10.description: A decent set of aeternium armor.
er.658f9d3063c9c47b.quests14.title: Shulker box
er.4402c0cd6f875200.title: &6The Engineering Era
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests0.description0: Engineer's hammer is necessary to create multiblock structures. The handbook also has information on how to build them!
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests1.title: Coke oven bricks
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests1.description0: Use these bricks to build a coke oven, which in turn will allow you to produce coke coal.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests2.description0: This coal is more effective than the usual one. You also need it to get steel!
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests3.title: Treated planks
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests4.description0: Kinetic dynamo can produce power as a part of a windmill or a water wheel.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests5.title: Blast furnace bricks
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests5.description0: Use these bricks to build a blast furnace to make some steel ingots. A bit of advice: you will need a lot of steel, so it's best to get multiple furnaces!
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests6.title: Steel ingots
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests6.description0: Ouch... Get ready to produce A LOT of steel.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests7.description0: Water wheel produces power using water flow.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests9.description0: You can transfer power using this!
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests10.description: LV capacitor can store power to use it later.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests11.description: Engineer's workbench is necessary for crafting press molds.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests12.description: Engineer's blueprint is also necessary for crafting press molds.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests13.description: With the metal press mold: plate you can craft plates from a variety of materials using a press.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests14.description: With the metal press mold: gear you can craft gears from a variety of materials using a press.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests15.description: With the metal press mold: rod you can craft rods from a variety of materials using a press.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests16.description: With the metal press mold: wire you can craft wires from a variety of materials using a press.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests17.title: Metal press
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests17.description: An extremely valuable machine which allows you to craft plates and other components more effectively.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests18.title: Crusher!
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests18.description: The crusher can pulverize ores to increase the ingot output!
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests19.title: Sawmill!
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests19.description: The sawmills allows you to process wood logs and everything connected.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests20.description: The chainsaw is a great tool for tree cutting.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests21.title: Fermenter
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests21.description: You can get ethanol from various seeds, fruits and vegetables using this machine.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests23.title: Squeezer
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests23.description: You can squeeze the oil out of plants for further processing.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests25.title: Refinery
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests25.description: Refinery can mix several fluids together, with the most common use case being turning ethanol and plant oil into biodiesel.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests26.title: Arc furnace
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests26.description: Arc furnace can smelt ores faster and recycle old gear.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests27.title: Reinforced blast bricks
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests27.description: A reinforced blast furnace can be built using these bricks, which allows you to craft even more steel.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests28.description: The MV capacitor works just like the LV one, but can store more power.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests29.description: The LV capacitor works just like the MV one, but can store more power.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests30.description: You can transfer more power using this!
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests31.description: You can transfer even more power using this!
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests32.title: Excavator
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests32.description: Excavator can mine ores for you(similarly to a quarry), but it needs a lot of power!
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests33.description: Core sample drill can check for ore deposits underground. You can view which ones you need using the engineer's manual.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests34.description: This book allows you to create a variety of decorative blocks.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests35.description: Metal bars are used in most of the decorative crafts.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests36.description: Old industrial wood planks can be used in many thematic builds.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests37.description: Labeled crates can be used as a substitute for normal chests in thematic builds.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests38.description: Staggered metal steps can be used as a substitute for normal ladders in thematic builds.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests39.description: Steel catwalk can be used as a bridge in thematic builds.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests40.description: Steel catwalk stairs can be used as a substitute for normal stairs in thematic builds.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests41.description: Steel floor grating can be used as a floor in thematic builds.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests42.description: Steel mesh fence can be used as a substitute for normal fences in thematic builds.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests44.description: The thermoelectric generator uses the contrast of temperatures to produce power when placed between a source of heat and a source of cold.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests45.title: Diesel generator
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests45.description: Diesel generator can produce a lot of power using more advanced fuel, such as biodiesel.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests46.description: Current transformer tells you how much power passes through it.
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests47.title: Lightning rod
er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests47.description: Lighting rod can produce a decent amount of power when struck by lighting.
er.79806ce493974743.title: &6Storage
er.79806ce493974743.quests0.description0: Fluix crystals are one of the resources you'll need to get an (almost) INFINITE storage! To create one, you'll have to drop 1 charged certus quartz, 1 nether quartz and 1 redstone dust in a water puddle.
er.79806ce493974743.quests1.description0: Inscriber is needed for various components used in making an ME storage system. You'll need various inscriber presses though, which are located inside the AE2 meteorites(4 it total)
er.79806ce493974743.quests2.description0: The inscriber presses are used to make an ME system.
er.79806ce493974743.quests3.description0: The inscriber presses are used to make an ME system.
er.79806ce493974743.quests4.description0: The inscriber presses are used to make an ME system.
er.79806ce493974743.quests5.description0: The inscriber presses are used to make an ME system.
er.79806ce493974743.quests6.description0: Meteorite compass points you towards the closest meteorite. Each one has a chest inside of it, containing valuable presses for your inscriber!
er.79806ce493974743.quests7.description0: Fluix ME glass cable can transfer AE2's power and more.
er.79806ce493974743.quests8.description0: Crystal growth accelerators can speed up the growth of pure crystals. Try crafting a few.
er.79806ce493974743.quests9.title: Quartz seeds
er.79806ce493974743.quests9.description0: These seeds grow into pure crystals when left in water for some time.
er.79806ce493974743.quests10.title: Pure crystals
er.79806ce493974743.quests10.description: Pure crystals are needed for a lot of future crafts in AE2.
er.79806ce493974743.quests11.description: ME controller is one of the most important blocks for a functioning ME system.
er.79806ce493974743.quests12.description: This one block can hold almost an infinite amount of resources, as long as you put storage cells inside.
er.79806ce493974743.quests13.description: A basic terminal which allows you to access the ME system.
er.79806ce493974743.quests14.description: ME pattern terminal allows you to create patterns, which are irreplaceable for autocrafting!
er.79806ce493974743.quests15.description: ME crafting terminal is similar to the normal one, but it also allows crafting.
er.79806ce493974743.quests16.description: A cell which holds 1024 bytes and 63 item types.
er.79806ce493974743.quests17.description: A cell which holds 4096 bytes and 63 item types.
er.79806ce493974743.quests18.description: A cell which holds 16384 bytes and 63 item types.
er.79806ce493974743.quests19.description: A cell which holds 65536 bytes and 63 item types.
er.79806ce493974743.quests20.description: A cell which holds 1024 bytes and 5 fluid types.
er.79806ce493974743.quests21.description: A cell which holds 4096 bytes and 5 fluid types.
er.79806ce493974743.quests22.description: A cell which holds 16384 bytes and 5 fluid types.
er.79806ce493974743.quests23.description: A cell which holds 65536 bytes and 5 fluid types.
er.79806ce493974743.quests24.description: Crafting units can be crafted into crafting co-processing units and crafting storage.
er.79806ce493974743.quests25.description: Craft co-processing units are necessary for an autocrafting system.
er.79806ce493974743.quests26.description: A storage which holds 1024 bytes used for crafting.
er.79806ce493974743.quests27.description: A storage which holds 4096 bytes used for crafting.
er.79806ce493974743.quests28.description: A storage which holds 16384 bytes used for crafting.
er.79806ce493974743.quests29.description: A storage which holds 65536 bytes used for crafting.
er.79806ce493974743.quests30.description: Crafting monitor allows you to watch your autocrafters work in real time.
er.79806ce493974743.quests31.description: Matter condenser can create matter balls and singularities by destroying a lot, *a lot* of items.
er.79806ce493974743.quests32.description: Singularity is easily crafted in the matter condenser by just destroying 256 thousands of items(yeah, just...)
er.79806ce493974743.quests33.description: Quantum entangled singularity can be created by exploding a singularity and a bit of ender dust on the ground.
er.79806ce493974743.quests40.title: A bit of flux
er.79806ce493974743.quests40.description: A start for the new era of wireless power.
er.6953150a66c1136b.title: &6The Pneumatic Era
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests0.title: Reinforced Bricks
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests0.description0: Reinforced bricks are used to create various blocks and items.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests1.title: Barochamber
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests1.description0: The barochamber is one of the most important devices of this mod. With it, you will create various items to progress through this mod!
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests2.description0: With the air compressor, you can generate compressed air by burning fuel, the main type of \"energy\" in this mod!
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests3.title: Pressure Pipes
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests3.description0: With pressure pipes, you can transfer compressed air to various mechanisms.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests4.description0: With the wrench, you can pick up items from this mod, close/open pipes, etc.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests5.description0: With the thermoprocessing plant, you can convert one liquid into another.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests6.title: Plastic Sheets
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests6.description0: Plastic sheets can be obtained by leaving it to harden in the world. The plastic itself can be used for many crafts in this modpack.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests7.description0: With the etching tank, you can obtain printed circuit boards. To do this, you need to fill the tank with acid and insert empty printed circuit boards.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests8.description0: With the assembly controller, you can control other assembly machines.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests9.description0: With the programmer, you can program drones.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests10.description: A regular drone that can be programmed for almost any action.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests11.description: With the programmable controller, you can replace drones. They are most often used for large-scale projects, such as quarries!
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests12.description: The logistic drone performs logistics tasks.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests13.description: The farming drone collects any fully grown plants.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests14.description: The defender drone can protect the area from hostile mobs.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests15.description: The collector drone gathers various items in its area of effect.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests16.description: An advanced version of the air compressor.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests17.description: With the electrostatic compressor, you can generate compressed air by having the lightning to strike the machine itself, which can very difficult to do!
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests18.description: The liquid compressor can generate compressed air by burning various fuel liquids.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests19.description: An advanced version of the liquid compressor.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests20.description: With the flux compressor, you can generate compressed air by converting Forge Energy.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests21.description: With the thermal compressor, you can generate compressed air by using temperature differences.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests22.description: An advanced version of the pressure pipe. (even if the name is unclear)
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests23.description: The air canister can be used to refill anything with compressed air at the refueling station.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests24.description: An improved version of the air canister.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests25.description: Very nutritious and tasty bread, you must try it!
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests26.description: With the vortex cannon, you can shoot streams of air. You can use them to, for example, shear animals.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests27.description: The GPS marker saves coordinates in the world. Use it in various devices from this mod, such as the programmer and air cannon.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests28.description: With the air cannon, you can throw items through the air. It requires a GPS marker to operate.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests29.description: Very tasty food, you must try it!
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests30.description: With the spawner extractor, you can extract the spawner core from the spawner. But not in an easy way...
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests31.description: With the empty spawner, you can create a hermetic spawner.
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests32.description: With the pressure spawner, you can create mobs using compressed air while ignoring the light level!
er.6953150a66c1136b.quests33.description: The spawner core can be placed in a hermetic spawner to spawn mobs contained in that core.
er.71840908ca6989e1.title: &bInformation
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests1.description0: Seasons have been added to the game!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests1.tasks0.title: Seasons
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests14.description: In the Akashic Tome, you can add any guide books to store them all in one place!
er.3db12eedd7301084.title: &bIntroduction
er.3db12eedd7301084.quests0.description0: Welcome to the Endless Rise modpack. In this modpack, you will explore many mods, from primitive technologies to launching a rocket. It will be a challenging journey, but we promise - you will enjoy it.
er.3db12eedd7301084.quests0.tasks0.title: Start of the Pack
er.3db12eedd7301084.quests1.description0: This modpack was made by BMProjects Studio. We have many packs for you to play (after this one, of course). We also translate English packs to make it more comfortable for you to play. We have a very cozy atmosphere, come in, don't be shy!
er.3db12eedd7301084.quests1.tasks0.title: BMProjects
er.6a357a7586f39d25.title: &6The Space Era
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests0.description0: On the NASA workbench, you will create the most important thing in this pack - A ROCKET!
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests1.title: Hammer
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests1.description0: The hammer is one of the most important items in this mod. It is needed for creating most of the mechanisms from this mod.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests2.title: Compressor
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests2.description0: With the compressor, compressed ingots are created. They are needed to create a whole ROCKET!
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests3.description0: An important ingredient in this mod.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests5.title: Oil Refinery
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests5.description0: With the oil refinery, you can create fuel for the rocket.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests6.title: Oxygen Loader
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests6.description0: With the oxygen loader, you can fill your suit with oxygen.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests7.description0: Desh ingots can be found ONLY on the Moon. With them, you can create compressed desh.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests9.description0: Silicon ingots can be found ONLY on Mars! With them, you can create compressed silicon.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests11.title: Launch Pad
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests11.description: The launch pad is where the rocket takes off into space!
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests12.description: With compressed desh, a level 2 rocket is created.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests13.description: Compressed silicon is needed to create a level 3 rocket!
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests15.subtitle: This is the end...
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests15.description: You have reached the end, congratulations!
And based on that, you liked the modpack. Thank you for playing!
er.7e3090efc42aff50.title: &6The Digital Era
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests0.description0: With the metallurgical filler, you can create different components by filling them with various substances, such as redstone.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests1.title: Basic Elements
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests1.description0: Basic components from this mod. You will need them to create various mechanisms.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests2.description0: With the energy smelter, you can quickly smelt ores and other items.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests3.description0: An improved version of the previous mechanism.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests4.description0: With the enrichment chamber, you can enrich ores into their analogs and more.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests5.description0: An improved version of the previous mechanism.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests6.description0: With the crusher, you can grind ingots into dust, create biofuel from plants, and more.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests7.description0: An improved version of the previous mechanism.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests8.description0: With the osmium compressor, you can create various gases from items and more.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests9.description0: An improved version of the previous mechanism.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests10.description: With the combiner, you can, for example, create ore from dust and cobblestone.
An improved version of the previous mechanism.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests11.description: An improved version of the previous mechanism.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests12.description: With the cleaning chamber, you can create blocks from ores for further processing.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests13.description: An improved version of the previous mechanism.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests14.description: With the chemical injection chamber, you can create shards from ores for further processing and more.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests15.description: An improved version of the previous mechanism.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests16.description: With the metallurgical filler, you can create different components by filling them with various substances, such as redstone.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests17.description: An improved version of the previous mechanism.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests18.description: With the sawmill, you can obtain planks from various wooden items, such as trapdoors or slabs.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests19.description: An improved version of the previous mechanism.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests20.description: With the solar panel, you can generate energy for mechanisms.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests21.description: An advanced version of the solar panel.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests22.description: With the wind generator, you can generate energy for mechanisms.

er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests50.description: A personal chest works like a normal one, except you can open it straight from your inventory.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests51.description: A cool robot that will be useful to craft an even cooler robot.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests52.description: A digital miner can mine any blocks in it's range of 32 blocks.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests53.description: This pickaxe requires energy to work, but it can't break. Also has a decent mining speed.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests54.description: A flamethrower can unleash hell to kill monsters or smelt some blocks.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests55.title: Utilities
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests55.description: A bunch of utilities that could come in handy.

er.09bc33749d387467.title: &6The Primal Era
er.09bc33749d387467.quests0.title: Sticks and Flint Shards
er.09bc33749d387467.quests0.description0: Sticks drop from breaking leaves. Flint shards can be obtained by smashing flint against a solid block, for example - stone.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests1.title: Gathering Rope
er.09bc33749d387467.quests1.description0: You will need rope to create primitive tools.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests2.description0: Using any vanilla hoe, you can obtain hay, which can be turned into fibers needed to create rope.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests3.description0: Drops from any grass using a vanilla hoe.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests4.title: Workbench
er.09bc33749d387467.quests4.description0: With a primitive axe, you can chop trees faster.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests5.title: Primitive Pickaxe
er.09bc33749d387467.quests5.description0: Will help you in mining ores for further processing.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests6.title: Primitive Sword
er.09bc33749d387467.quests6.description0: A simple way to kill hostile mobs in the early stages of the game.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests7.title: Primitive Shovel
er.09bc33749d387467.quests7.description0: Clay is needed to create a clay vessel and smelt your first metal - copper!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests8.title: Clay Vessel
er.09bc33749d387467.quests8.description0: Needed to smelt metals (mostly). To do this, you need to place it in a pit (Shift + Right Click), cover it with dirt on all sides, place hay (Right Click) and wood (Right Click) on top, and then light it.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests9.title: Bricks
er.09bc33749d387467.quests9.description0: They will be needed to obtain coke and build a blast furnace.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests10.title: Copper Ingots
er.09bc33749d387467.quests10.description: Copper ingots are needed to build a blast furnace and smelt more heat-resistant metals.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests11.title: Blast Furnace
er.09bc33749d387467.quests11.description: To build a blast furnace, you need to place 2 blocks of bellows on the sides, and on them, blocks of bricks. Also, to speed up the process, you need bellows that are attached to the blocks of bellows.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests12.title: Iron Ore
er.09bc33749d387467.quests13.description: This is the main metal that will help you transition to a new era - the Mechanical Era!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests14.title: Coke Block
er.09bc33749d387467.quests14.description: To obtain a coke block, you need to ignite and seal a block of regular coal with bricks.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests15.title: Flint and Steel
er.09bc33749d387467.quests16.title: Copper Ore
er.09bc33749d387467.quests17.description: A fairly simple way to gather food in the early stages of the game.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests18.title: Gathering Flint
er.09bc33749d387467.quests18.description: With a hand mill, you can obtain flint, which you will need to create primitive tools.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests19.description: A chest that holds more items, you will need it.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests20.title: Inside the Hive \"bzzz...\"
er.09bc33749d387467.quests20.description: To enter the hive, you need to throw an ender pearl into the hive itself. To exit, you need to go down to the very bottom. (fall out of the hive)
er.09bc33749d387467.quests21.title: Pollen
er.09bc33749d387467.quests21.description: This pollen is generated in the dimension of the hive. There is a lot of it, enough for all of your needs.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests22.title: Beeswax for the Hive
er.09bc33749d387467.quests22.description: Spawns at the very bottom of the hive. (Pretty much replaces bedrock)
er.09bc33749d387467.quests23.title: Bricks
er.09bc33749d387467.quests23.description: To obtain bricks, you need to place clay bricks on the ground (shift + right click to place on the ground, cover with dirt on all sides except the top). Then, place hay (right click) on the bricks and logs (right click) on top, then light it and wait.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests24.description: With a campfire, you can easily cook food.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests25.description: You can place kitchen utensils on the kitchen stove and cook some very delicious dishes!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests26.description: With a kitchen cauldron, you can prepare tasty dishes, for this you need to place it on the kitchen stove.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests27.description: A teleportation stone is needed to make a guiding obelisk, and to teleport to another point without an obelisk. (Hold Right Click)
er.09bc33749d387467.quests28.description: With a guiding obelisk, you can teleport over long distances. For this, you need at least 2 points (2 obelisks) or a teleportation stone.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests29.description: A convenient item for storing things while traveling.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests30.title: First Coal
er.09bc33749d387467.quests30.description: To obtain charcoal, you need to place a pile of logs in a closed space (place a block of dirt on each side, except one). Then light the pile and cover it with a block of dirt, and just wait.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests32.description: You can store many items in chests.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests35.title: Cart
er.09bc33749d387467.quests36.title: Miscellaneous
er.09bc33749d387467.quests38.title: Cog
er.09bc33749d387467.quests38.description: A fast way to navigate through the water!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests73.description: The Tanner Worktable is necessary to create various items where Leather is used. For example, Empty canteen or Backpack.
er.57d608a24de940da.title: &6The Nether
er.57d608a24de940da.quests0.title: Portal to Nether
er.57d608a24de940da.quests0.description0: With the help of obsidian, you can build a portal to the Nether.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests0.tasks1.title: Portal to Nether
er.57d608a24de940da.quests0.tasks2.title: Visit the Nether dimension
er.57d608a24de940da.quests1.title: Boss
er.57d608a24de940da.quests1.description0: With the help of 3 skeleton skulls and 4 soul sand, you can summon a boss - The Wither.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests2.description0: After defeating the boss, you will receive a reward - Nether Star. You will need it.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests3.description0: With the help of a Beacon, you can gain a permanent positive effect, but for that, you need to spend quite a bit of resources. For the first level, you will need 9 precious blocks, for example, iron. They need to be placed under the Beacon (3x3), after which it will activate.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests4.description0: Just glowstone dust, which can be re-crafted into glowstone!
er.57d608a24de940da.quests5.title: Ancient Debris
er.57d608a24de940da.quests5.description0: Ancient debris is a very rare ore in the Nether, but with its help, you can obtain powerful gear.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests6.title: Netherite Scrap
er.57d608a24de940da.quests6.description0: With the help of Netherite scrap, you can create Netherite ingots to upgrade your gear.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests7.description0: With the help of Netherite ingots, you can upgrade your gear and more. These ingots will be needed in many crafts.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests8.title: Blaze Rods
er.57d608a24de940da.quests8.description0: With the help of blaze rods, you can create an Eye of Ender, which in turn will help you reach the End!
er.57d608a24de940da.quests9.title: Eye of Ender
er.57d608a24de940da.quests9.description0: With the help of the Eye of Ender, you can enter a new dimension - the End!
er.57d608a24de940da.quests10.description: With the help of a brewing stand, you can brew potions that may be needed later.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests11.title: Glowstone
er.57d608a24de940da.quests12.description: Can be found in a fortress.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests13.description: Just quartz, often found in the Nether.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests16.title: Fire Armor
er.57d608a24de940da.quests17.title: Fire Combat Gear
er.57d608a24de940da.quests17.description: A good sword and a shield.
er.57d608a24de940da.quests22.title: Netherite Armor
er.57d608a24de940da.quests23.title: Netherite Tools
er.57d608a24de940da.quests24.title: Level 1 Beacon
er.57d608a24de940da.quests25.title: Level 2 Beacon
er.57d608a24de940da.quests26.title: Level 3 Beacon
er.57d608a24de940da.quests27.title: Level 4 Beacon

er.reliquary.title: &6Reliquary
er.reliquary.quests0.subtitle: There is a risk of balance loss!
er.reliquary.quests0.description0: &6Alckahestry Tome&r is a relic that accumulates a charge of Redstone or Glowstone dust in order to double almost any resources.
er.reliquary.quests0.description1: To &2Activate&r a relic you need to hold &eSHIFT&r and then click &eRMB&r, making it so it automatically absorbs and glow/red stone from your inventory.
er.reliquary.quests0.description2: To &2Double&r any resources, you have to put a relic in the crafting grid alongside the resource you want. This will double the resource, but drain some power from the tome.
er.reliquary.quests1.subtitle: Salvation from the falling damage!
er.reliquary.quests1.description0: &6Angelic Feather&r is a relic that saves its owner from falling off a big height by absorbing the damage and consuming owner's hunger. Also gives permanent jump boost.
er.reliquary.quests2.subtitle: Undead hates this one simple trick!
er.reliquary.quests2.description0: &6Cross of Mercy&r is a relic that causes additional damage against undead, and also has an increased level of looting.
er.reliquary.quests2.description1: In addition, it is made out of gold, therefore it is more enchantable, but has less durability. Therefore, it's better to use it alongside the &2Touchstone of Midas&r.
er.reliquary.quests3.subtitle: The relic hidden by Aphrodite!
er.reliquary.quests3.description0: &6Aphrodite's Serum&r is a relic that contributes to the reproduction of animals if it is thrown next to them.
er.reliquary.quests4.subtitle: It looks like a totem of immortality!
er.reliquary.quests4.description0: &6Angelheart Vial&r is a relic that breaks when the owner dies, but heals them and gives positive effects, saving from death.
er.reliquary.quests5.subtitle: A relic that allows you to fly!
er.reliquary.quests5.description0: &6Rending Gale&r is a relic that allows its owner to fly in the direction of the camera. Keep in mind that it does not cancel the fall damage, unless you look at the ground and use the relic to land safely.
er.reliquary.quests5.description1: The Rending Gale also can &2attract&r or &2repel&r creatures, or spawn a &alightning&r during a thunderstorm.
er.reliquary.quests5.description2: You can &2Switch&r between these modes by using a combination of keys &eSHIFT&r + &eLMB&r.
er.reliquary.quests5.description3: And in order to fly or to spawn lightnings, the relic must be &2charged&r with &afeathers&r.
er.reliquary.quests6.subtitle: An endless source of water!
er.reliquary.quests6.description0: &6Emperor Chalice&r is a relic which serves as an endless source of water. in addition to that, you can drink from the chalice to restore hunger by sacrificing health.
er.reliquary.quests7.subtitle: Useful in the Nether!
er.reliquary.quests7.description0: &6Infernal Chalice&r is a relic that can store lava inside, and also protects its owner from lava and fire in exchange for hunger.
er.reliquary.quests8.subtitle: A unique weapon!
er.reliquary.quests8.description0: &6Magicbane&r is a relic that only has &e16&r durability and is one of the most easily broken weapons that exists in this modpack.
er.reliquary.quests8.description1: When hit by this blade, there is a&e50%&r chance of imposing one of the following effects: &nConfusion&r, &nBlindness&r, &nSlowness&r, &nWeakness&r.
er.reliquary.quests8.description2: In addition, if you apply any &2Enchanting&r on the blade, then the level of the enchantment will be added to the relic's &atotal damage&r.
er.reliquary.quests8.description3: For example, a Magicbane enchanted with fire aspect 2 will have &e2&r additional damage.
er.reliquary.quests8.description4: It is formally &2golden&r, so the Touchstone of Midas works, and so that it has the same enchantability as gold.
er.reliquary.quests8.description5: NOTE: &0Magicbane is an artifact from a game called Nethack, which the author of this mod would like to tribute a bit.
er.reliquary.quests9.subtitle: Technically a magnet!
er.reliquary.quests9.description0: &6Coin of Fortune&r is a relic that attracts items and experience orbs within a radius of 5 blocks to its owner. It is toggleable via a combination of keys &eShift&r + &eRMB.&r
er.reliquary.quests9.description1: The radius of the relic can be &2tripled&r. To do this, click &eRMB&r with the relic in the hand, which will change the radius to around 15 blocks.
er.reliquary.quests10.subtitle: An interesting mechanics at the relic!
er.reliquary.quests10.description0: &6Sojourner Staff&r is a relic that absorbs up to &e1500&r torches, and then places them at a great distance.
er.reliquary.quests10.description1: This relic can be used to place torches/blocks at a distance of up to &e30&r blocks, but at the same time, every &e6&r blocks increases the number of torches/blocks spent by 1.
er.reliquary.quests10.description2: For example, by placing a torch at a distance of &e30&r Blocks, the relic owner will spend &e6&r torches at once.
er.reliquary.quests10.description3: If you have both the &6Sojourner Staff&r and the &6Lantern of Paranoia&r, the latter will try to use the internal storage of the staff in order to place the torches.
er.reliquary.quests11.subtitle: Convenient for traveling!
er.reliquary.quests11.description0: &6Ender Staff&r is a relic that facilitates travel. When you press &eSHIFT&r + &eRMB&r, the relic will begin absorbing Ender pearls to charge. Afterwards, it can spend this charge to teleport its owner. This relic has &2several modes&r that can be switched by pressing &eSHIFT&r + &eLMB&r.
er.reliquary.quests11.description1: In the &lShort Distance&r mode (an ender pearl icon) the relic will launch a completely ordinary ender pearl, but landing will not inflict damage to its owner.
er.reliquary.quests11.description2: In the &lLong Distance&r mode (an ender eye icon) the relic will launch a ender pearl that will be less subject to gravity, which contributes to a larger distance of the flight of pearl and, therefore, teleportation of the owner.
er.reliquary.quests11.description3: In the &lGhost Node&r mode , it teleports the owner to a &2Gost Node&r, to which the staff is tied. To tie the relic to a node, you just need to click &eRMB&r in the same mode.
er.reliquary.quests12.subtitle: Universal relic!
er.reliquary.quests12.description0: &6Pyromancer's Staff&r is a relic that shoots fire balls, similar to those that ghasts and blazes use. It is charged with blaze powder or fire charges.
er.reliquary.quests12.description1: In addition, it &2prevents&r the owner from being hit by fireballs sent by blazes or ghats. It will also extinguish flames around the owner, but only when it's turned off.
er.reliquary.quests12.description2: And finally, Pyromancer Staff &2will replace&r its owner's &2Flint and Steel&r.
er.reliquary.quests13.subtitle: Useful in the Nether!
er.reliquary.quests13.description0: &6Ice Magus Rod&r is a relic that absorbs (&eSHIFT&r + &eRMB&r) snowballs from the inventory of its owner and shoots them at the enemy. It is more effective against opponents from the &cNether&r.
er.reliquary.quests14.subtitle: An improved version of the Ice Magus Rod!
er.reliquary.quests14.description0: &6Glacial Staff&r is a relic, which is an improved version of the Ice Magus Rod. This relic also shoots snowballs that are useful against fiery opponents.
er.reliquary.quests14.description2: But the Glacial Staff also has an &2additional ability&r - it turns water into dense ice, and lava into obsididan, if the owner holds the staff in his hand. These blocks melt when they are outside the radius of the action of the staff.
er.reliquary.quests15.subtitle: It loves a large number of items!
er.reliquary.quests15.description0: &6Infernal Tear&r is a relic that consumes (&eSHIFT&r + &eRMB&r) items that the owner has the most of in their inventory, and exchanges them for experience.
er.reliquary.quests16.subtitle: Useful for storing experience!
er.reliquary.quests16.description0: &6Hero Medallion&r is a relic that stores experience. When activating the relic, it will absorb the experience of its owner. If it is not activated, then by pressing the RMB will return 1 level of experience to the owner.
er.reliquary.quests17.subtitle: An improved version of the totem of immortality!
er.reliquary.quests17.description0: &6Pheonix Down&r is a relic that can resurrect its owner after a deadly blow, while giving them fully restored health and many positive effects.
er.reliquary.quests17.description1: After using the relic, it turns back into an &2Angel Feather&r.
er.reliquary.quests18.subtitle: Useful in the Nether!
er.reliquary.quests18.description0: &6Infernal Claws&r is a relic that absorbs fire damage, but not lava, by taking owner's hunger.
er.reliquary.quests19.subtitle: It will come in handy under the water surface!
er.reliquary.quests19.description0: &6Kraken Shell&r is a relic that absorbs the drowning damage, but uses owner's hunger for this.
er.reliquary.quests20.subtitle: Useful for gold items!
er.reliquary.quests20.description0: &6Touchstone of Midas&r is a relic that restores the durability of gold items by using glowstone from the owner's inventory.
er.artifacts.title: &6Artficacts
er.artifacts.quests0.subtitle: Useful in battle and travel!
er.artifacts.quests0.description0: &6Umbrella&r is an artifact that can be used in combat like a shield, or like a planner while you travel. One item, two uses!
er.artifacts.quests0.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests1.subtitle: Endless?
er.artifacts.quests1.description0: &6Everlasting Beef&r is a food that you can eat an infinite number of times.
er.artifacts.quests1.description1: It can be obtained, with a small chance, when killing a cow.
er.artifacts.quests2.subtitle: Timeless?
er.artifacts.quests2.description0: &6Eternal Steak&r is a fried everlasting beef. It can also be eaten an infinite number of times, but the steak restores more hunger and saturation.
er.artifacts.quests3.subtitle: I'm not sure if that's useful...
er.artifacts.quests3.description0: &6Plastic Drinking Hat&r is an artifact that allows you to eat and drink faster.
er.artifacts.quests3.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests4.subtitle: I'm not sure if that's useful...
er.artifacts.quests4.description0: &6Novelty Drinking Hat&r is an artifact that allows you to eat and drink faster.
er.artifacts.quests4.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests5.subtitle: Great if you love the ocean!
er.artifacts.quests5.description0: &6Snorkel&r is an artifact that allows its owner to breathe under water. This makes the exploration of water depths more safe and convenient.
er.artifacts.quests5.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests6.subtitle: Useful in the night!
er.artifacts.quests6.description0: &6Night Vision Goggless&r is an artifact that gives you the ability to see in the dark. The night is no longer dark and scary...
er.artifacts.quests6.description1: They can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests7.subtitle: Useful when trading!
er.artifacts.quests7.description0: &6Villager Hat&r is an artifact that gives you additional discounts when trading with villagers.
er.artifacts.quests7.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests8.subtitle: Useful when hunting monsters!
er.artifacts.quests8.description0: &6Superstitious Hat&r is an artifact that gives you an additional level of looting when killing mobs.
er.artifacts.quests8.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests9.subtitle: Useful when mining!
er.artifacts.quests9.description0: &6Lucky Scarft&r is an artifact that gives its owner an additional level of luck, which allows you to more profitably mine various resources.
er.artifacts.quests9.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests10.subtitle: For what? Unknown ...
er.artifacts.quests10.description0: &6Scarf of Invisibility&r is an artifact that hides you from curious eyes.
er.artifacts.quests10.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests11.subtitle: Support from Femida!
er.artifacts.quests11.description0: &6Cross Necklace&r is an artifact that increases the duration of invincibility after taking damage.
er.artifacts.quests11.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests12.subtitle: Support from Hermes!
er.artifacts.quests12.description0: &6Panic Necklace&r is an artifact that increases your speed after receiving damage. A fairly useful artifact that will help to fight more effectively and retreat after taking serious damage.
er.artifacts.quests12.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests13.subtitle: Support from Zeus!
er.artifacts.quests13.description0: &6Shock Pendant&r is an artifact that can shock your enemies.
er.artifacts.quests13.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests14.subtitle: Support from Hephaestus!
er.artifacts.quests14.description0: &6Flame Pendant&r is an artifact that can set your enemies on fire.
er.artifacts.quests14.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests15.subtitle: Support from Ares!
er.artifacts.quests15.description0: &6Thorn Pendant&r is an artifact that can damage your enemies.
er.artifacts.quests15.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests16.subtitle: Support from Poseidon!
er.artifacts.quests16.description0: &6Charm of Sinking&r is an artifact that allows you to move freely underwater.
er.artifacts.quests16.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests17.subtitle: More convenience!
er.artifacts.quests17.description0: &6Cloud in a Bottle&r is an artifact that provides you with a double jump, making your movement around the world faster and more convenient.
er.artifacts.quests17.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests18.subtitle: I wonder who used to own it?
er.artifacts.quests18.description0: &6Obsidian Skull&r is an artifact that gives you temporary invulnerability from fire.
er.artifacts.quests18.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests19.subtitle: Useful when fighting witches!
er.artifacts.quests19.description0: &6Antidote Vessel&r is an artifact that reduces the duration of negative effects, allowing you to survive longer in fights, especially against witches.
er.artifacts.quests19.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests20.subtitle: Could be one of the most useful artifacts!
er.artifacts.quests20.description0: &6Universal Attractor&r is an artifact that attracts nearby object to you, making your life a little easier.
er.artifacts.quests20.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests21.subtitle: Careful not to break it!
er.artifacts.quests21.description0: &6Crystal Heart&r is an artifact that gives you additional health, thus improving survivability.
er.artifacts.quests21.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests22.subtitle: 0_0 Amazing!
er.artifacts.quests22.description0: &6Helium Flamingo&r is an artifact that allows you to swim through air for a limited time! To do this, you need to go into the water, wait until Flamingo is charged, and then start swimming in the water and fly out of it into the air. Incredible!
er.artifacts.quests22.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests23.subtitle: Simple, but effective!
er.artifacts.quests23.description0: &6Digging Claws&r is an item that increases your basic mining level and mining speed in general, making your life a little easier.
er.artifacts.quests23.description1: They can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests24.subtitle: Simple, but useful!
er.artifacts.quests24.description0: &6Feral Claws&r is an artifact that increases your attack speed, improving the total damage.
er.artifacts.quests24.description1: They can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests25.subtitle: They make you stronger!
er.artifacts.quests25.description0: &6Power Glove&r is an artifact that gives you 4 additional damage when fighting.
er.artifacts.quests25.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests26.subtitle: Just don't set yourself on fire!
er.artifacts.quests26.description0: &6Fire Gauntlet&r is an artifact that sets the mobs you attack on fire. The main rule when wearing this artifact is not to set fire to yourself.
er.artifacts.quests26.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests27.subtitle: An amazing item!
er.artifacts.quests27.description0: &6Pocket Piston&r is an artifact that increases the knockback you inflict on mobs.
er.artifacts.quests27.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests28.subtitle: Magic or trickery?
er.artifacts.quests28.description0: &6Vampiric Glove&r is an artifact that will restore your health when damaging the enemy.
er.artifacts.quests28.description1: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests29.subtitle: A pleasant addition!
er.artifacts.quests29.description0: &6Golden Hook&r is an artifact that increases the amount of experience mobs drop.
er.artifacts.quests29.description2: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests30.subtitle: Convenience!
er.artifacts.quests30.description0: &6Aqua Dashers&r is an artifact that allows you to walk above the surface of various liquids, although it only works when you're sprinting.
er.artifacts.quests30.description1: They can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests31.subtitle: Light as a rabbit!
er.artifacts.quests31.description0: &6Bunny Hoppers&r is an artifact that increases your jump height, and also completely removes fall damage.
er.artifacts.quests31.description1: They can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests32.subtitle: Quite cute, but not for everyone!
er.artifacts.quests32.description0: &6Kitty Slippers&r is an artifact which scares creepers off. Finally, you don't have to worry about unexpected explosions from behind.
er.artifacts.quests32.description1: They can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests33.subtitle: Nice shoes!
er.artifacts.quests33.description0: &6Runnig Shoes&r is an artifact that increases your speed, probably because they are very comfortable.
er.artifacts.quests33.description1: They can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests34.subtitle: Steady yourself!
er.artifacts.quests34.description0: &6Steadfast Spikes&r is an artifact that absorbs the knockback you receive, making it great for combat.
er.artifacts.quests34.description1: They can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests35.subtitle: Great for swimmers!
er.artifacts.quests35.description0: &6Flippers&r is an artifact that increases your speed in the water, making you faster under the layers of water.
er.artifacts.quests35.description1: They can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.artifacts.quests36.subtitle: The most important artifact!
er.artifacts.quests36.description0: &6Whoopee Cushion&r is an artifact that is guaranteed to increase the amount of fun you will have playing.
er.artifacts.quests36.description2: It can be found in &2treasuries&r of various dungeons.
er.3db12eedd7301084.quests0.subtitle: Time to make some progress!
er.3db12eedd7301084.quests1.subtitle: Modpack authors!
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests14.description: Fuel bucket is useful for fueling rockets and the rover.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests15.description: Oxygen tank is a useful crafting component.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests17.title: Space Suit
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests17.description: You won't make it far in the space without a space suit.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests18.title: Netherite Space Suit
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests18.description: An improved version of the Space Suit.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests19.description: Oxygen Bubble Distributor creates a 3x31 area with oxygen, which allows breathing on different planets.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests20.description: The wheel is used to create your own rover.
er.6a357a7586f39d25.quests21.description: Rover is a great way of personal transportation on different planets.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests1.subtitle: A start of a new chapter in technology!
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests56.description: Advanced components used in Mekanism. You will need them for some of the mechanisms.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests57.description: Elite components used in Mekanism. You will need them for some of the mechanisms.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests58.description: Ultimate components used in Mekanism. You will need them for some of the mechanisms.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests59.description: Reaction chamber is used for making new and interesting resources.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests60.description: Plutonium is one of the rarest resources you can obtain.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests61.description: Polonium is one of the rarest resources you can obtain.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests62.description: Chemical Crystallizer will help you process ores even further.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests63.description: Antimatter is one of the rarest resources you can obtain.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests64.description: Plutonium can be recycled back into nuclear fuel using these fragments.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests65.description: Teleportation core is used to make new mechanisms and items.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests68.description: This block with a smart name can transmute some items using antimatter.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests69.title: The Industrial Era
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests69.subtitle: A new stage!
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests69.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6Industrial Age&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests70.description: Pity machine frame is the first machine frame needed for Industrial Foregoing.
It's used to craft basic machines.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests71.description: Latex processing unit creates latex when placed near a log.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests72.title: Plastics
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests72.description: Once you get enough latex, you can get started on plastics.
Plastics are used for a multitude of new machines and items.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests73.description: A simple machine frame is an upgraded version of the last one.
It's used to craft new mechanisms and items.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests74.description: Advanced machine frame is an upgraded version of the last one.
It's used to craft new mechanisms and items.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests75.description: Mob slaughter factory allows you to get pink slime from killing mobs.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests76.description: Pink slime is a liquid that's useful for crafting several things.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests77.description: Pink slime ingot can be used in some crafts.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests78.title: Laser Drill
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests78.description: Laser drill can get a lot of ores from nothing.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests79.description: Ether can be obtained using a fluid laser base.
It will be used in several crafts.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests80.description: Supreme machine frame is an upgraded version of the last one.
It's used to craft new mechanisms and items.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests81.description: Dissolution chamber is a mechanism that can be used for crafting a lot of interesting things.
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests82.description: It's a mechanism useful for automation of your base!
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests83.description: It's a mechanism useful for automation of your base!
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests84.description: It's a mechanism useful for automation of your base!

er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests90.description: It's a mechanism useful for automation of your base!
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests91.description: It's a mechanism useful for automation of your base!
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests92.title: Applied Age
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests92.subtitle: A new stage!
er.7e3090efc42aff50.quests92.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6 &r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests71.description: An upgraded version of a furnace.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests72.description: A canteen helps you go on longer journeys by allowing you to carry drinkable water.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests39.title: Pottery Pit
er.09bc33749d387467.quests39.description: Since you don't have a furnace yet, you might have to use a pottery pit.
To smelt items in the pit, you have to:
- Place your items on the ground (Shift + RMB) and cover it with dirt on all sides except the top;
Use RMB to place straw on top (6 pieces);
- And then set it all on fire!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests40.title: Some stone
er.09bc33749d387467.quests40.description: You still have no furnace, so you will have to make do with the pit to get stone for now.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests41.title: Don't burn yourself!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests41.description: You can't simply grab a hot item from the furnace in this modpack.
Now you need to use a towel to safely remove cooked food or smelted ingots from the furnace. Don't ask me.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests42.description: Congratulations, you have a furnace now!
But that's too easy, isn't it? In this modpack, you have to start fire in the furnace for it to work.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests43.description: Smoker cooks food twice as fast.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests44.title: Fire! Fire!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests44.description: Flint and steel by itself won't start fire in this modpack.
You also need to have a piece of gunpowder in your inventory for it to work.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests45.description: Towel hanger is a neat way to place your towel on a wall.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests46.description: Cooking glove works the same as a normal towel.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests47.description: Potter's Worktable is used for crafting clay items, such as bricks, clay buckets and more.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests48.subtitle: A new stage!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests48.description: After finding your first iron, you can finally craft the Engineer's Worktable and enter the new stage - &6The Mechanic Era&r!
Engineer's Worktable is used for crafting things related to engineering, such as the quartz grindstone.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests49.description: A good way to get a lot of pollen.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests51.description: Plow can plow the dirt much faster than you.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests52.description: Carpenter's Worktable is used for crafting wooden items, such as chests, barrels and more.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests53.description: The barrel can produce many new food items and beverages.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests54.description: The paper is made by drying the wet paper on the drying rack.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests55.description: Mage's Worktable is used for crafting magical items, such as gateway pearls.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests56.description: Books can be made on the tanner's worktable.
It can be used for a lot of interesting things, but for now the Antique Atlas should be your priority.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests57.description: Wet paper can be obtained by soaking sugar cane or wood sawdust in the wooden basin.
It can then be turned into normal paper.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests58.description: The drying rack can dry items, who would've thought.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests59.description: The antique atlas is this modpack's version of the minimap.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests60.description: Wooden basic is used for soaking items in it.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests61.description: The cheese can be made in the barrel using milk and some vinegar.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests62.description: Wooden shears are an early game alternative to the iron ones.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests63.title: Clay Bucket
er.09bc33749d387467.quests63.description: You don't have any iron yet, so this will have to do for moving liquids.
But first, you need to fire it inside the pottery pit.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests64.title: Copper Age
er.09bc33749d387467.quests64.subtitle: A new stage!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests64.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6The Copper Age&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests65.title: Iron Age
er.09bc33749d387467.quests65.subtitle: A new stage!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests65.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6The Iron Age&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests66.title: Primal Age
er.09bc33749d387467.quests66.subtitle: A new stage!
er.09bc33749d387467.quests66.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6The Primal Age&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests67.description: Patterns are created on the carpenter's workatble.
They can be used to create new tool or armor parts .
er.09bc33749d387467.quests68.description: To get your first tools, you will need:
er.09bc33749d387467.quests69.title: New tools
er.09bc33749d387467.quests69.description: Vanilla tools are disabled in this modpack and can only be used for crafting.
Instead, you will have to use the tools provided by the Tinker's Construct mod.
er.09bc33749d387467.quests70.description: The kiln can fire various objects.
er.13e0000b8592c62d.title: &6The Grand Finale...
er.57d608a24de940da.quests29.title: The End!
er.57d608a24de940da.quests29.subtitle: A new stage!
er.57d608a24de940da.quests29.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6The End Dimension&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests9.subtitle: A new stage!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests46.description: The whisk is used to craft the mechanical mixer.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests47.description: The propeller is used to craft the encased fan.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests52.description: The crushing wheels will allow you to get a bit of cinder flour.
Said flour can in turn be used to craft the blaze cake base.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests53.description: The blaze cake is made by filling a base with lava.
It can overheat the blaze burners to craft new things.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests54.description: The foundry will allow you to obtain a rose gold ingot.
This alloy is made from copper and gold(3 to 1) and will be used as a crafting ingredient.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests55.description: The bounty board can be naturally found in villages, but you can also craft it.
The board generates quests which you can complete for rewards.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests58.description: The boiler is used to crafting an advanced steel boiler or an engine.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests59.description: The engine can be used to make your first aircrafts - airship and a biplane.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests60.description: The biplane is a relatively fast way to travel the skies.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests61.description: The airship is a relatively fast way to travel the skies.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests62.title: Golden Age
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests62.subtitle: A new stage!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests62.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6The Golden Age&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests63.title: Diamond Age
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests63.subtitle: A new stage!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests63.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6The Diamond Age&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests64.description: After unlocking this stage, you will finally be able to mine and use diamonds.
They are useful for crafting a variety of new items.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests65.description: After unlocking this stage, you will finally be able to mine and use gold.
It's useful for crafting a variety of new items.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests66.title: Mechanic Age
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests66.subtitle: A new stage!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests66.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6The Mechanical Age&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.

er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests67.subtitle: A new stage!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests67.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6The Nether Dimension&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests68.title: Survivalist's equipment
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests68.description: These items may come in really handy during your adventures.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests69.title: Colder, even colder!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests69.description: These strings can be used to protect against temperatures.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests70.description: The Tesla coil can charge various items.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests71.title: The best armor
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests71.description: You can pour molten metals inside these casts to create tools and weapons.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests72.title: Engineering Age
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests72.subtitle: A new stage!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests72.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6The Engineering Age&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.

er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests73.subtitle: A new stage!
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests73.description: By completing this quest, &o(clicking the tick)&r, you can access a new stage - &6The Atum Dimension&r!
This stage will give you access to more mechanisms, items and more.
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests74.title: Common
er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests74.description: This can be applied to armor to protect against temperatures.

er.61c23a1a1b8933b6.quests75.description: This can be applied to armor to protect against temperatures.

er.4402c0cd6f875200.quests3.description0: Usual planks can be combined with creosote to get treated planks.

er.79806ce493974743.quests34.description: Energizing orb will empower items using electricity.

er.79806ce493974743.quests45.title: Dielectric paste
er.79806ce493974743.quests45.description: You will be able to craft dielectric paste and other components after getting the appropriate stage.
er.79806ce493974743.quests46.description: Dielectric casing is the base for mechanisms from this mod.
er.79806ce493974743.quests47.description: Capacitors are fairly important for crafting mechanisms from Powah.
er.79806ce493974743.quests48.description: The wrench can configure your mechanisms.
er.79806ce493974743.quests49.description: The aerial pearl can be turned into a Player Aerial Pearl.
er.79806ce493974743.quests50.description: To get a Player Aerial Pearl, you have to RMB a zombie or a husk while holding an Aerial Pearl.
The Player Aerial Pearl can be used to get a wireless charging system.
er.79806ce493974743.quests51.description: Player transmitter will charge your items wirelessly.
er.79806ce493974743.quests52.description: Batteries can be used as a power bank to charge your items or mechanisms.

er.71840908ca6989e1.quests0.subtitle: Something for a change!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests13.subtitle: Almost a minimap!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests14.subtitle: All of your knowledge in one book!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests3.subtitle: Important changes!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests3.description0: This quest contains a list of the main changes you should know about.
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests3.tasks0.title: Modpack quirks
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests4.subtitle: Technological development!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests4.description0: This modpack has a wide variety of vehicles, from carts and rafts to vessels and airships!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests4.tasks0.title: Transportation
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests5.subtitle: And some rewards!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests5.description0: By crafting the bounty board, you can accept various quests and get rewards for their completion.
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests5.tasks0.title: More quests!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests6.subtitle: New mechanics!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests6.description0: - The fire has to be started for the furnace to work;
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests6.description1: - They can set things on fire in a radius of a few blocks;
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests6.description2: - You need a towel to safely take items from furnaces.
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests6.tasks0.title: Everything about furnaces
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests7.subtitle: Diverse crafting!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests7.description0: Many recipes have been transferred to various worktables from the Artisan Worktables mod!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests7.description1: In addition, all the crafting in these workbenches requires Tools.
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests7.description2: We have set up the recipes so that tools made of any materials (wood, iron, steel - it doesn't matter) are available for each craft.
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests7.description3: Therefore, at the beginning of the game you can use, for example, wooden tools. And in the middle and at the end of the game, there are more advanced ones that have a greater unbreaking.
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests7.tasks0.title: New crafting tables
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests8.subtitle: Dangerous foes!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests8.description0: Sometimes, you will encounter stronger mob variants from the mod Champions!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests8.tasks0.title: Stronger mobs
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests9.subtitle: A variety of eyes!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests9.description0: Instead of 12 normal eyes of ender, you will have to collect 12 different eyes from the End Remastered mod!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests9.tasks0.title: The End is changed too!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests10.subtitle: More ways to get resources!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests10.description: Gate pearls from the GatewaysToEternity mod can be used to spawn a portal with certain mobs!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests11.subtitle: Decorations and commodities!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests11.description: Normal trees are replaced with new ones, which are also easier to chop down!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests12.title: Game stages
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests12.subtitle: Important information!
er.71840908ca6989e1.quests12.description: One of the main features of Endless Rise are the &6Gamestages&r.
As you progress, you will unlock new stages, which, in turn, will allow you to obtain more items, blocks, mechanisms and much more!
Here's a list of all the game stages:
If you didn't get a certain game stage for any reason, you can use following command to unlock it: [/gamestage add @a \"Stage name\" false].
